data.name: Angel Perversion
data.detailed_description:
Angel Perversion Is A Short Kinetic Visual Novel.
The guardian angel Umabela is not satisfied with the life of her protégé, so she decides to break the rules and make his life much easier.

Features:
700 Full Hd Images.
22 Full Hd Animations.
You Can Decide the Name Of the Character.
Music and sound effects.
Ren'py Engine.



Calista is the president of the company where you work.
She is a very strong woman, but one who knows how to reward her best employees....

Vanessa is Calista's daughter. She has a complex character, she has many problems, will you be able to help her?



Jennifer is your colleague. She does everything she can to make you look bad; she's your enemy.
However, every enemy has a weakness, what is hers?

Maggie is a very sad woman. She works in a clothing store and has no customers.
Will you be able to make her happy?



Umabela is your guardian angel, something has changed in the way she does things though, and things around you, will have a different light.

You're a good guy, or at least that's what you think....

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.
Contains nudity,  graphic depictions of oral, vaginal, anal, and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids, mention of rape, blackmail.
